personality.purpose: SoloBuddy is a Build in Public companion system with web hub that provides multi-project visibility and content generation for creators.
personality.techStack: Node.js, Express, GitHub OAuth, Git Watcher, JavaScript
personality.philosophy: No corporate speak, consistency wins over rare epic efforts, don't interrupt during dev
personality.pains: Need for multi-project visibility and proactive buddy messages based on repo activity
personality.dreams: Complete Intent-Based AI roadmap phases, enhance subagent system workflows
